publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5089 Chris Ballance: Rules Governing Members’ Expenses—That the Parliament requests that the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body should commission an independent review of the rules governing members’ expenses. Supported by: Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-5089 Rules Governing Members’ Expenses (lodged on 3 November 2006) Patrick Harvie*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-5089 Rules Governing Members’ Expenses (lodged on 3 November 2006) Carolyn Leckie*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-5089 Rules Governing Members’ Expenses (lodged on 3 November 2006) Robin Harper*
S2M-5089 Rules Governing Members’ Expenses (lodged on 3 November 2006) Shiona Baird*
